column2: Job Description: Ops BI - Analyst Overview: The BI Analyst is responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to provide actionable insights that support decision-making and enhance business processes. The BI Analyst collaborates with various departments to ensure effective utilization of information systems and technologies, ultimately contributing to the organization's efficiency, productivity, and strategic planning. Key Responsibilities: Reporting and Visualization : Create and maintain      dashboards, reports, and visualizations to present complex data in a      comprehensible manner. Analyse large datasets to      identify trends, patterns, and anomalies. Utilize statistical methods      and tools to extract meaningful insights from data. Customize reports to cater      to different user needs, ensuring the right stakeholders have access to      relevant information. Continuously improve the      quality and design of reports to enhance their value and usability. Strategic Decision Support : Collaborate with business      stakeholders to understand their requirements and objectives. Analyse data to provide      insights that aid in strategic planning, process improvement, and      decision-making. Establish data quality      standards and protocols to maintain accurate and reliable data. Monitor data consistency,      accuracy, and compliance with regulatory requirements. Implement data governance      practices to ensure data security and privacy. Continuous Improvement : Stay updated with industry      trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in MIS and data      analysis. Propose and implement      process improvements to enhance data management and analysis capabilities. Participate in      cross-functional teams to contribute MIS expertise to broader      organizational initiatives. Required Skills: 1) Expert proficiency in Microsoft Excel (can maintain complex spreadsheets), Power BI, MS Access, and VBA (Visual Basic for Applications). 2) Working experience of Power BI to develop and build dashboards based on stakeholder requirements, enhancement/modification to existing dashboards  3) Data mining and Interpretation - Ability to extract, sanitize and streamline large volumes of data from different sources to analyze and identify/ point out trends relevant to service quality, to customer experience, or to efficient delivery of the services.  4) Data visualization and Critical thinking. Competencies that will be Assessed: 1) Prior experience of working with business intelligence tools (Power BI), data modelling, data staging, and data extraction processes. Understanding of Microsoft/ Google analytics. 2) Communicating Effectively. 3) Planning & Organizing Work.
